name: hardwood forestry, eucalyptus ssp., planted forest management | cleft timber, measured as dry mass | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/21012/documentation

;This dataset represents the production of 1 kg of eucalyptus wood fuel (fresh matter) from planted forest management. The actitivity lasts 14 years with 2 harvesting events. Specie mainly cultivated is E. urograndis.;References:;;Canals, 2003: Contributions to LCA Methodology for Agricultural Systems. Site-dependency and soil degradation impact assessment: http://www.tdx.cat/handle/10803/3155;Nemecek & Schnetzer: Methods of assessment of direct field emissions for LCIs of agricultural production systems, Data v3.0 (2011): http://www.ecoinvent.org/fileadmin/talkpages/pages/01-01-crop-production/01_crop_production_-_direct_field_emissions___natural_resources_v1.1.pdf;Novais & Smyth (1999) Fósforo em solo e planta em condições tropicais. Viçosa: Universidade Federal de Viçosa, p. 399.;Novaes, Renan M. L. et al. (2017) Estimating 20-year land use change and derived CO2 emissions associated with crops, parture and forestry in Brazil and each of its 27 states. Global Change Biology, 2017, 1-13.;Nemecek T., Bengoa X., Lansche J., Mouron  P., Riedener E., Rossi V. & Humbert S. (2015) Methodological Guidelines for the Life Cycle Inventory of Agricultural Products. Version 3.0, July 2015. World Food LCA Database (WFLDB). Quantis and Agroscope, Lausanne and Zurich, Switzerland.

Activity starts with the establishment of the eucalyptus plantation in the first year, covers the maintenance during six years and the first harvesting in the seventh. Eucalyptus sprouts are conducted to regrowth and the same process is repited.

The processing of wood is not performed as the final product are logs for energy. This activity ends with the logs at the forest road and includes time for drying in air before transportation. The dataset does not include the seedling production and the infrastructure of firebreaks and forest roads.
category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/021:Silviculture and other forestry activities/0210:Silviculture and other forestry activities

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time period of the most of the data collected for this dataset.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: The inventory is modelled as a weighted average of other geographies.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Cultivation of wood to generate energy inside industries.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: Carbon content is based on ecoinvent database
processDocumentation.samplingDescription: This dataset is a weighted average of the other geographies.
